Text.val: 07.01.2013 GB SCR18597 Extended range of selection in Query 1/2 (see SCR to get more details)
06.11.2008. GB SCR14088 Changed type for GNRD_DIRECTORYPATH from 11 to 88
06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing
01.10.2008 GB SCR14002 Added call prg. GM102 - sent the three files
-- Get the path for the files

STP.TXT: GNRD - G E N E R A L D I R E C T O R Y (ENTRY 88) I S E M P T Y

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DHIC_ID, DHIC_DEBH from :1/DHIC join :1/DEBH a on a.DEBH_NO = DHIC_DEBH and a.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY = 'BE' and a.DEBH_DEBTORTYPE = 0 and a.DEBH_AUTREFLIMBLOCKED = 'N' and a.DEBH_LEGALFORM not in ('VZW', 'ASBL') join :1/DEBH b on (b.DEBH_NO = DHIC_DEBH or b.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH = DHIC_DEBH) join :1/DEBC c on c.DEBC_DEBH = b.DEBH_NO join :1/DEBB on DEBB_DEBC_NO = c.DEBC_NO and days(curdate()) - days(DEBB_DATLASTSCHEDULE) <= 365 join :1/DEBC d on d.DEBC_DEBH = DHIC_DEBH and d.DEBC_CREDITLIMIT is not null and d.DEBC_DATDELETED is null and d.DEBC_CODECREDITLIMIT <> 2 join :1/ADMN on ADMN_NO = c.DEBC_ADMNO and ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = 'N' where DHIC_INFS_CODE = 'BE' and SUBSTRING(DHIC_ID,1,2) <> '02' group by DHIC_ID, DHIC_DEBH order by DHIC_ID, DHIC_DEBH for fetch only

select DHIC_ID, DHIC_DEBH from :1/DHIC join :1/DEBH a on a.DEBH_NO = DHIC_DEBH and a.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY = 'BE' and a.DEBH_DEBTORTYPE = 0 and a.DEBH_AUTREFLIMBLOCKED = 'N' and a.DEBH_LEGALFORM not in ('VZW', 'ASBL') join :1/DEBH b on (b.DEBH_NO = DHIC_DEBH or b.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH = DHIC_DEBH) join :1/DEBC c on c.DEBC_DEBH = b.DEBH_NO join :1/DEBB on DEBB_DEBC_NO = c.DEBC_NO and days(curdate()) - days(DEBB_DATLASTSCHEDULE) <= 365 exception join :1/DEBC d on d.DEBC_DEBH = DHIC_DEBH and d.DEBC_CREDITLIMIT is not null and d.DEBC_DATDELETED is null and d.DEBC_CODECREDITLIMIT <> 2 join :1/ADMN on ADMN_NO = c.DEBC_ADMNO and ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = 'N' where DHIC_INFS_CODE = 'BE' and SUBSTRING(DHIC_ID,1,2) <> '02' group by DHIC_ID, DHIC_DEBH order by DHIC_ID, DHIC_DEBH for fetch only
select CLIC908_ID, CLIC908_CLNTNO from :1/CLIC where CLIC908_ADMNO = 3 and CLIC908_INFS_CODE = 'BE' order by CLIC908_ID, CLIC908_CLNTNO for fetch only
